messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

make visible console thursday february re required hello please proceed creation best head thursday february required hello please approve please advised compatible jabber looking forward hearing form thanks kind regards analyst ext hub thursday february has assigned hello please advised record number has assigned please review details take appropriate action reference number details null choose template applicable please provide short description required details asap order daily collaboration remote add requested unknown location location please link kind regards ref msg
